name: TCG Pokedex
description: React App that shows Pokemon Cards consuming  REST API

name: N-Queens Simulator
description: Website to visualize and compare different aproaches to solve the N-Queens problem such as backtracking and stochastic algorithms. This project was done with pure HTML and Javascript

name: Silver Journey
description: Mobile App to keep your language learning progress. It lets you add activities, create a schedule and remind you of your planned activities. Built with React Native and testable through Expo Go
